title: Android/iOS Engineer
jobDescription: Collaborated with a team of Android and iOS developers in the development of Opera Pay (Opay App).
Designed and Developed Login/Pay with Opay for third party applications, and OWealth cash investment feature.

title: Android/iOS Engineer
jobDescription: Developed native iOS application for offline/online personal banking/financial service using SMS API service.
Developed an offline banking service iOS and Android SDK for commercial banks in Nigeria.
Involved in the management, update and improvement of the continuous integration systems.
Involved in the onboarding of new team members.
Created documentation for the project code base and third-party library license.
Worked closely with the project manager, in deciding relevant features, improvement and solutions needed.
Worked closely with backend engineer in the development of scalable offline SMS API service.
Communicated with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis.

title: Android/iOS Engineer
jobDescription: Developed Copula, an offline peer-to-peer media streaming application.
Developed Storyart, an Android image & video editing app, with over 30,000+ users.
Worked with a variety of different languages, platform, frameworks such as Java, C, JAX-WS, Jersey and FFMpeg.
